item.description:
The Full Moon Wellness Night goes from 3 to 5 pm followed by a vegetarian potluck dinner from 5 to 6 pm. This event integrates creative, culturally diverse and holistically healthy festivities and events. Get your resolutions off to a great start with an invigorating night of healing and renewal!

The Wellness program from 3 to 5 pm will include:

ChalkArt Wall for a Peaceful Planet
- Create visions for world peace

Lunar Rhythm Drums with Kahlil
- Playful drumming for a new year

Healthy Cocktail Open Cash Bar
- $2 for juice drinks or teas

Bamboo Flute Music Meditation
- Breathe deeply â€¦ and relax

Moon Salutation Yoga with Imani
- Feel the full brilliance of the moon

JourneyDance Movement with Marie
- Express the power of your soul (see description below)

Community Veggie Potluck Dinner
- Bring a favorite dish to share at 5 pm

Infrared Sauna Sessions

Healing Spa & Detox Therapy


A $15 donation will support the Growing Green Wellness Community and Healing Arts Space. Or, for a $20 donation you can become a member of the Green Vibration!


Green Vibration Memberships include discounts for the Growing Green Wellness Center's fitness classes, sauna and healing treatments. All members will receive a 10% discount on their next event and a free sauna session! To learn more about monthly memberships, please visit www.GrowingGreenEvents.com/Join-Our-Community.


Please see www.GrowingGreenEvents.com/Calandar for other upcoming events!


Journey Dance - Movement as Spiritual Practice

Ritual.
Ritual makes magic. We create ritual space. Magic happens, Spirit enters, Hearts open. We begin in circle and make sound as a group. We use imagination to create mini-rituals: we build a fire, we plant a garden of dreams, we become warriors. We explores freely, safe in the dance. We reflect on our experience outside of ritual space and make meaning.

Imagery.
Images and creative visualization enliven the journey. Specific sensual images transport us into the present moment, into our bodies, into other worlds: we sink into the mud, we bathe in golden honey, we surge as an ocean wave, we hunt as warriors, we float like feathers. Images focus the mind, the body finds natural expression, and soul travels.

Music.
Music and sound impulse our bodies and spirits. Music alone has the power to change our states, moods, and levels of consciousness. Our music opens the seven Chakras, invokes the elements of earth, water, fire, air, ether, and rides the Fluids of the body. Careful weaving of specific songs stimulates and inspires us into empowered boundless expression.

Creativity.
Creativity is the expression of soul. JourneyDance inspires creativity. We create the life we want. While moving and buzzing positively we visualize, feel and manifest. Music and movement bypass the mind, allowing us as soul to discover, trust, and affirm our deepest hearts knowing.
item.name: Full Blue Moon New Year Celebration & Wellness Night
